metadata.description:
In reaction to the global NFT hype, Studio Continuo presents the limited edition NFT, "Don't Turn Around" by Polina Kanis. This NFT was exclusively provided to 25 visitors of the exhibition, "Don't Turn Around".

NFT is certified by Studio Continuo (Arthur Steiner, Melchior Jaspers) and was issued in a former bank in Amsterdam.

Purchase includes:

Medium: Photograph (Apple, iPhone 7)  
Edition: 25  
Dimensions: 6614 X 10039  
Owner's rights and obligations

Through her work, [Polina Kanis](https://www.polinakanis.com/) reflects on human action and agency in an age of rapid automation, financialization and algorithmic governance. How can we emancipate ourselves from the central financial infrastructures that rule our day-to-day life?
metadata.name: Don't Turn Around (NFT 1/25)
